clues.response: the Gulf of California (or the Sea of Cortez)

rounds.comments: (Alex: In this category, we've taken the first name of one charcter in a motion picture, combined it with the last name of a second charcter, but both of them have been played by the same actor or actress.  You have to come up with that individual.)
